unnormalised: **Poribesh Reak Khobor: Bandipur Kul Abhyarany Re Bachao Dohok Chesta Badli Te Bes Phalao Hoju Kana**
normalised: **Paryavaran Khabor: Bandipur Chenta Atu Than re Bachao Kami-ko Lebhet Phal Em Akawda**

unnormalised: Bandipur, Karnataka – Nutun jochona hisabte, Bandipur Kul Abhyarany, Karnataka re kul ganana re bes din tira abuj kana, tikau sanrakkhan karyakram badli te. Karnataka Ban Bibhag re Nirdeshak Dr. Rajesh Kumar ghoshona keda je 2020 ganana tulona te kul dekhao re 15% boro hokana.
normalised: Bandipur, Karnataka – Nutun nirakh-jokh lekate, Karnataka renah Bandipur Chenta Atu Than bhitar re, lagatar bachao kami-ko baday te, chenta honko dohoren re do lebet disha nelok kanah. Karnataka Bir Bivag renah Disari Dakdar Rajesh Kumar, du hazar gel-gel lekha-jokha tuluj do chenta nelhok re gel-engey bhag barhaw hoy akana men te ghosana akawda.

unnormalised: Noa sapholtari do bas jayga sudhar, sekhera rukha podokkhep, ar abhyarany reak kanthi pher re somaj bhagedari karyakram lekana chesta badli te hokana. Bibhag do mul dhancha sudhar lahti 5 koti Taka kharch keda, jae re mot 500 square feet horek re nawa sekhera rukha camp banab menak.
normalised: Noa kamyab do atu-than sudhar, haram-sakam rukha kami-ko, ar atu-than nake-nake renah hor-honko rasiyak karyakram-ko baday te hej akana. Bivag do thapa-thapi sudhar re pe modh koḍi taka laga akawda, jahan re mosa-mosin pe say square feet jasti japut nawa haram-sakam rukha dere banaw kami hõ saonte menah-ah.

unnormalised: Inarahon, gaonren horo sathen sahajog, bishesh karke Soliga lekana adivasi gana, marang bhumika nibhao keda. Jimedari sathen chalao kana poribesh paryaṭan karyakram do sanrakkhan lahti paisa te sahaj keda ar badli monjuri jugao keda, jae te ban jinish upperre nirbharta kome keda.
normalised: Aho, dinak hor-honko saonte juri-kami, khan-khan Soliga lekan adibasi hor-honko saonte, do marang kami nel akana. Jimedarika te cholaw-kan bonga buru nel bhraman kami-ko do bachao re taka te sahay emok kanah ar badli roji-rojgar emok kanah, jahan te bir renah jinish uper renah bhar kami-kanah.

unnormalised: Abhyarany, 874.2 square kilometer pharihao kate menak, ban jontu chalak lahti marang rasta lekate kamio kana. Bhogot reak yojana re arho 100 square kilometer bachao jayga boro ar khatra jayga dhare dhare te suruj shokti chalito bera banab badli te horo-jontu jhogra komak re dhyan emak menak.
normalised: Irahel say chasi-gel pun ar du dashamik square kilometer phanjaw-akan atu-than do bonga buru janwar sen-en lahat do muchal hor leka kami kanah. Hiji-lenah kami-disa re do bachao then aho mit say square kilometer barhaw kami, ar kam-jor then-then re dinam bonga jhal banaw baday te hor-janwar ladai kami re ninda dohok kami do saonte menah-ah.
